Title: Komadori Eiga: Komaneko
Description: ['Komaneko is the story of a very curious cat, named Koma-chan, that attempts to make her own stop motion. She deals with many challenges, but she also made some friends while creating her movie. Her curiosity makes her even more friends.']
Staff: [['Gouda, Tsuneo', 'Director, Animation Director, Creator, Character Design']]
